title: SHE MD Breast Cancer Risk Calculator

items: For women in the US, choose the BI-RADS ATLAS option for Breast Density Measure.
For Breast Density, refer to your mammogram or breast MRI.
After you calculate lifetime risk, see SHE MD Action Plans.

blocks.text: Collect inputs here, open IBIS in a new tab, then paste results and explanations back into this form.
Use this summary for manual entry into IBIS.

This information is not a substitute for professional healthcare and does not replace evaluation by a clinician. Always consult a healthcare provider. Do not disregard professional medical advice or delay seeking care because of this tool.
